maker: Pieter de Swart, probably carved by Agostino Carlini
title: Torchère
description: Torchère; Pieter de Swart (Dutch, 1702 - 1772), probably carved by Agostino Carlini (Italian, about 1718 - 1790); The Hague (possibly), Netherlands; about 1748 - 1753; Gessoed, painted, and gilt limewood; crushed glass; bases possibly of dogwood; 214 cm (84 1/4 in.); 79.DA.5.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
